snippet: Visitors to the National Mall have been confronted with an empty Reflecting Pool and a closed Washington Monument as construction crews make repairs.
abstract: Visitors to the National Mall in Washington, DC, have been confronted with an empty Reflecting Pool and a closed Washington Monument as construction crews make repairs.
lead_paragraph: Visitors to the National Mall have been confronted with an empty Reflecting Pool and a closed Washington Monument as construction crews make repairs.

headline.seo: National Mall Dotted With Construction Projects
headline.main: Bulldozers Join Tourists as Fixtures in Capital
headline.print_headline: Bulldozers Join Tourists As Fixtures in Capital
